title: Cinnamon Pancakes
steps: In a bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, cinnamon, and baking powder.
In another bowl, mix milk, egg, melted butter, and vanilla extract.
Combine the wet and dry ingredients until just mixed.
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat.
Pour 1/4 cup of batter per pancake into the pan.
Cook until bubbles form, flip, and cook the other side until golden.

title: Classic Burger
steps: Grill the beef patty until fully cooked.
Toast the burger bun lightly.
Place the patty on the bottom bun.
Add cheese, lettuce, tomato, and onion.
Top with ketchup and mustard, then close with top bun.

title: Chicken Tacos
ingredients: Sour cream and salsa to serve
steps: Warm tortillas on a pan or oven.
Fill each tortilla with shredded chicken.
Top with lettuce, tomatoes, onions, and cheese.
Add sour cream and salsa as desired.
Serve immediately.

title: Caesar Salad
steps: In a large bowl, toss lettuce with Caesar dressing.
Add croutons and Parmesan cheese.
Top with sliced grilled chicken if desired.
Serve chilled.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
steps: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Fry pancetta in a pan until crispy, add garlic last minute.
Beat eggs and mix with Parmesan cheese.
Drain pasta and immediately toss with egg-cheese mixture and pancetta off the heat.
Season with salt and pepper, garnish with parsley.
Serve immediately.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
steps: Heat vegetable oil in a wok or large pan over high heat.
Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry for 30 seconds.
Add all vegetables and stir-fry until tender-crisp, about 5-7 minutes.
Add soy sauce and sesame oil, toss to coat.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.
